title:
Type II Singularities of Lagrangian Mean Curvature Flow with Zero Maslov
  Class
authors: Xiang Li, Yong Luo, Jun Sun
abstract:
In this paper, we will prove some rigidity theorems for blow up limits to
Type II singularities of Lagrangian mean curvature flow with zero Maslov class
or almost calibrated Lagrangian mean curvature flows, especially for Lagrangian
translating solitons in any dimension. These theorems generalized previous
corresponding results from two dimensional case to arbitrarily dimensional
case.
